overview: 'Tendulkar Out' film portrays the match of Sunil Tendulkar's life, whose idol is Sachin Tendulkar. It is one day match of Sunil Tendulkar v/s Abbas, Nair and Lefty. Who will win ans who will lose? It is a game of life. 'Tendulkar Out' answers all mysterious questions, leaving behind a heart-throbbing experience in the minds of the viewers
title: Tendulkar Out
